titles.title: No Federal Tax Dollars for Illegal Aliens Health Insurance Act of 2022
No Federal Tax Dollars for Illegal Aliens Health Insurance Act of 2022
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to ensure that taxpayer funds for health insurance coverage are available only to authorized individuals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
No Federal Tax Dollars for Illegal Aliens Health Insurance Act of 2022
This bill prohibits states from using certain federal funds provided to subsidize health insurance to offset the cost of health insurance coverage (including through premium or cost-sharing reductions) or provide any other benefit to undocumented immigrants.
